EmailTemplate.subject: Envato Elements: Photo Invitation | Private & Confidential
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Company},
{!User.FirstName} here from Envato, hope you're doing well!
We really liked your portfolio on {!Lead.LeadSource__c} and invite you to upload photos to our new digital asset offerings, Envato Elements subscription service (https://elements.envato.com), and PhotoDune marketplace (https://photodune.net).
We recently cleaned up the PhotoDune library and launched a new photo category on Elements which is attracting lots of new customers and our photographers are already seeing fantastic results. Our current average monthly earnings are over $200 US (and climbing) & our top earners exceed $3,000 US per month.
"June's earnings on Envato Elements was almost as much as I got from Adobe Stock, which is my #2 earning site. Was pleasantly surprised. Wish Envato Elements all the best." - Photos Author
As you can see from the quote above, our innovative subscriber share model is working well for the photographers. You can read more about the model here: https://help.contributors.elements.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/216749198-What-is-the-Subscriber-Share-model-
What are we looking for?
1. Self-curated collections in line with our commercial demand guidelines (https://help.market.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/217906203-Commercial-Demand-Guide)
2. A commitment to uploading photos every month. (We can discuss what is achievable for you.)
If you’d like to earn more from your photos, simply reply "I’m interested" and we'll get back to you with next steps.
Feel free to ask any questions you may have about this invitation only offer. Thank you so much and hope to hear from you soon! :-)
Regards, {!User.FirstName} Envato Elements
